column4: i want to write gtk program.and use glade.but glade3 does not match with gtk version
i want to write gtk program.and use glade.but glade3 does not match with gtk version.who can help me?thanks
unless you're wanting the plugin, febreeze might do the trick
use an earlier version of Ubuntu. Canonical decided we shouldn't have the option of using the old gnome, it doesn't fit with their policy of making us learn a new OS every 6 months.
